mapper.select: SELECT a.seq ,a.productCategory ,a.productName ,a.productRating ,a.productDiscountPercent ,a.productOriginalPrice ,a.productDiscountPrice ,a.deliveryPrice ,a.productCountryOfOrigin ,a.productNumber ,b.* FROM product a left join productUploaded b on a.seq = b.pseq WHERE 1=1
